widget.name: Custom Dropdown
widget.description: Widget to make a selection in a dropdown menu.

property.caption: Context object id
property.description: Id attribute of the context object.

property.caption: Context object label
property.description: Label attribute of the context object.

property.caption: Enable pagination
property.description: Retrieves the dropdown values in smaller set

property.caption: Page size for pagination
property.description: Number of records retrived per page(not used if "Enable pagination" is set to false)

property.caption: Data source
property.description: Please use a microflow to retrieve. Get the default value that has to be set. Currently it is only possible to return lists in this datasource property, therefore make sure to return a list only containing the object you want to have as the default value. For options the same object type must be selected.

property.caption: Object id default value
property.description: Id attribute of the object.

property.caption: First label default value
property.description: The first label attribute of the selectable objects.

property.caption: Second label default value
property.description: The second label attribute of the selectable objects.

property.caption: Image URL default value
property.description: The image url attribute of the selectable objects.

property.caption: Dynamic class default value
property.description: The dynamic class string of the default object.

property.caption: Data source
property.description: Please use a microflow to retrieve. Get all the objects you want to suggest as options. The same object type as for the default value must be selected.

property.caption: Object id options
property.description: Id attribute of the object.

property.caption: Refresh on context change
property.description: Forces a refresh of the data source when the context object is changed. This way you can refresh your default options.

property.caption: First label options
property.description: The first label attribute of the selectable objects.

property.caption: Second label options
property.description: The second label attribute of the selectable objects.

property.caption: Image URL options
property.description: The image url attribute of the selectable objects.

property.caption: Dynamic class options
property.description: The dynamic class string of the selectable object.

property.caption: Select option microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed when a option is selected.

property.caption: Enable create
property.description: Enable the Custom Dropdown to create options when none are found when searching.

property.caption: Create value microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed when a new value is created.

property.caption: Enable clear
property.description: Enable the Custom Dropdown to clear the selected value.

property.caption: Clear value microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed when the selected value is cleared.

property.caption: Enable searching
property.description: Enable the Custom Dropdown to search for options.

property.caption: Refresh datasource
property.description: Refresh the datasource when filtering. Enabled this option only if there is a filter action in the datasource. (not used if "Enable searching" is set to false)

property.caption: On focus action
property.description: Action to be executed when the widget element is focussed.

property.caption: useDefaultStyle
property.description: Do you want to use the default styling?

property.caption: useAvatar
property.description: Do you want add an avatar image to the select values?

property.caption: Placeholder
property.description: Placeholder text for when there are no labels.

property.caption: ClassName
property.description: Custom class name.

property.caption: ClassNamePrefix
property.description: Custom Class name prefix.

property.caption: Menu height
property.description: Max dropdown menu height in pixels

property.caption: Menu placement
property.description: Default placement of the menu in relation to the control. 'auto' will flip when there isn't enough space below the control.

property.caption: Menu position
property.description: The CSS position value of the menu, when "fixed" extra layout management is required.
